publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-09 23:58:04 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: This collection consists of photographic negatives taken by the Black Studio, Inc., a commercial photography studio located in Schenectady, New York.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Black Studio was founded in 1942 in Schnectady, New York by Gene Black and purchased by Joseph Ianniello in 1975.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photographic negatives taken by the Black Studio, Inc., a commercial photography studio located in Schenectady, New York. The negatives include aerial shots, local businesses, passport portarits, weddings, advertising, and on-sight photography.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Michael Ianiello donated the collection to the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives in 2008 May.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in these materials have not been transferred to the University Libraries. Copyright resides with the Ianniello family and the family must be notified of all requests to digitize materials.

The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives. The department will then contact the donor as appropriate.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Black Studio, Inc. Records, 1960-1987. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Black Studio Records).
